laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Serum electrolytes, calcium, phosphorus, magnesium, glucose, total protein, albumin, globulin, alkaline phosphatase, lactate dehydrogenase, and alpha-fetoprotein
Tests of coagulation and kidney and liver function

laboratory_examinations.findings: Mixed response with improvement in lymphadenopathy but worsening bone disease.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: After treatment with crizotinib, decrease in the size of paraesophageal lymph-node mass and lung nodules.

laboratory_examinations.procedure_name: Bone scans before and after treatment
laboratory_examinations.date: Before and after treatment with crizotinib
laboratory_examinations.findings: Radio-tracer uptake in the metastases in T1 and L4 vertebrae before treatment; decreased uptake after therapy.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Improvement in T1 and L4 metastases after treatment.
